title: MNF Preview: Bucs-Giants Gambling Picks, Props & DFS Advice (Football 11/2)
description:
It's Bucs-Giants to wrap up Week 8 in the NFL as Will Brinson is joined by Larry Hartstein to break down MNF from a gambling perspective. Larry liked the early number with Tampa Bay -10.5, does he feel the same at -12.5 or -13? Chris Godwin is out and we have to wait another week for the debut of Antonio Brown, so what player props are worth targeting with an adjusted offense for the Buccaneers. The guys offer lots of props plus DFS advice in this preview episode.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @LarryHartstein
